00001 #include "SkyDome.h"
00002 #include "CaelumSystem.h"
00003 #include "GeometryFactory.h"

00005 namespace caelum {
00006 
00007 const Ogre::String SkyDome::mSphericDomeResourceName = "CaelumSphericDome";
00008 
00009 SkyDome::SkyDome (Ogre::SceneManager *sceneMgr) {
00010   GeometryFactory::generateSphericDome (mSphericDomeResourceName, 32);
00011   mNode = sceneMgr->getRootSceneNode ()->createChildSceneNode ();
00012   Ogre::Entity *ent = sceneMgr->createEntity ("Dome", mSphericDomeResourceName);
00013   ent->setMaterialName (CaelumSystem::SKY_DOME_MATERIAL_NAME);
00014   ent->setRenderQueueGroup (Ogre::RENDER_QUEUE_SKIES_EARLY + 2);
00015   ent->setCastShadows (false);
00016   mNode->attachObject (ent);
00017 }
00018 
00019 SkyDome::~SkyDome () {
00020   // TODO: Detach and destroy all attached objects.
00021   static_cast<Ogre::SceneNode *>(mNode->getParent ())->removeAndDestroyChild (mNode->getName ());
00022 }
00023 
00024 void SkyDome::preViewportUpdate (const Ogre::RenderTargetViewportEvent &e) {
00025   Ogre::Camera *cam = e.source->getCamera ();
00026   mNode->setPosition (cam->getRealPosition ());
00027   if (cam->getFarClipDistance () > 0)
00028     mNode->setScale (Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_SCALE * (cam->getFarClipDistance () - CAMERA_DISTANCE_MODIFIER));
00029   else
00030     mNode->setScale (Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_SCALE * (cam->getNearClipDistance () + CAMERA_DISTANCE_MODIFIER));
00031 }
